title: Get the peace of mind you need

licenceTrial: After the tryal period, the subscription automatically renews and will be charged %@ %@ unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal anytime by going to Account Settings or through iTunes.
